channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court Allows Parents To Opt Children Out Of LGBT Propaganda In School
item.description: Alito noted in the opinion that the curriculum was designed to indoctrinate children into accepting homosexual unions and 'transgender' ideology.

item.title: The European Union’s Economic Double Standard with America Must End
item.description: The EU can’t have it both ways: relying on American technological leadership while building an entire policy framework around curbing it.

item.title: Trump’s NATO Win
item.description: If the Europeans can deliver on their new defense-spending commitments, the result will be a much safer world.

item.title: Make A Pit Stop To Watch This New Formula One Movie In IMAX
item.description: F1: The Movie shows the triumphs and tragedies that lie behind the world’s most popular open-wheel racing series.

item.title: Trump says U.S. has signed a deal with China on trade, without giving details
item.description: The U.S. and China have signed an agreement on trade, President Trump said, adding he expects to soon have a deal with India.

item.title: SCOTUS Punts Louisiana Redistricting Case To Next Term
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court announced on Friday that it is punting a high-profile Louisiana redistricting case to its next term. While the case was origina...

item.title: In 6-3 Ruling, Supreme Court Affirms Texas’ Right To Protect Children From Online Obscenity
item.description: 'Obscenity is no exception to the widespread practice of requiring proof of age to exercise age-restricted rights,' Thomas wrote.

item.title: China, U.S. signal steps to implement trade deal
item.description: The U.S. and China are taking steps to implement a London trade framework that compels the Chinese side to release rare earth minerals while the Ameri...

item.title: Supreme Court rules for parents challenging school's LGBTQ story time
item.description: The Supreme Court ruled that parents can opt their pre-K and elementary-age children out of story time that includes LGBTQ books.

item.title: The Week: America Smashes Iran’s Nuclear Sites — and Negotiates a Cease-Fire
item.description: Plus: Zohran Mamdani takes out Andrew Cuomo in the first round of New York City’s Democratic mayoral primary.

item.title: Ranked Choice at the Movies
item.description: Hollywood’s version of the anti-majority election scheme.

item.title: Justice Barrett Takes A Flamethrower To KBJ’s Reality-Challenged Dissent In Birthright Citizenship Case
item.description: Associate Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson has never been one to shy away from engaging in left-wing political activism while on the bench. And now, it a...

item.title: Justices back Trump on nationwide injunctions, clear way for limits on birthright citizenship
item.description: The Supreme Court delivered a shock wave to anti-Trump judges Friday, saying their use of "universal injunctions" to block the president's agenda nati...

item.title: Trump seizes momentum from ceasefire deal to expand peace in Middle East
item.description: Three days after announcing a ceasefire between Iran and Israel, the Trump administration is working to broaden a sustainable peace in the region, inc...

item.title: After Trump’s Successful Strikes on Iran, No More Non-Proliferation Illusions
item.description: High-minded international commitments are easy to make; enforcement is a different story.
